name: Delta Air Lines, Inc.
summary: Delta Air Lines, Inc., founded in 1925, is a major U.S. airline headquartered in Atlanta, operating nine hubs with over 5,400 daily flights to 325 destinations across six continents. A founding member of the SkyTeam alliance, Delta ranks first in revenue and brand value among global airlines, and has received top rankings from The Wall Street Journal and Cond√© Nast Traveler. The airline reported $61.64 billion in revenue and $3.46 billion net income for FY 2023.
